CustomField.description: Used to broadly categorize the donor’s intended use of their gift. The list is organized in the follow manner: #Unrestricted: Gifts for general support. CF = Crisis Funds: Gifts restricted for established crisis funding. Followed by the location/description of the crisis. FS = Fiscal Sponsorship: Gifts for our fiscal sponsored grantee partners. Followed by the acronym of the group. GM = Grantmaking: Gifts restricted for activities that include grantmaking. Followed by the region/issue as applicable. Gifts that are restricted to more than one region should use CR (Cross Regional.) PF = Pooled Fund: Gifts from multiple donors for a specific initiative. Followed by the description of the initiative. Prog = Program: Gifts restricted for activities that do not include any grantmaking. Followed by a description of the department/activity. Temp-Time = Time-restricted general support donations.
